Question: JD Solution CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
John Deere

Product: JD Solution CES 2024

- See & Spray software-as-a-service (SaaS) pricing model, currently charging $4 per acre, used on 1 million acres, saving 8 million gallons of chemicals
- RFID tech on cotton harvesters for yield map and cotton quality
- Autonomous tillage solutions for 8 and 9 series tractors, tilled 50,000 acres, retrofit solution for 8 Series models of 2020 or later and 9 Series models of 2022 or later
- Furrow Vision retrofit solution for planters available in 2025, monetized on a per acre or per unit basis
Summary_cn:
约翰迪尔

产品：JD解决方案CES 2024

- See & Spray软件即服务（SaaS）定价模型，目前以每英亩4美元收费，用于100万英亩，节省800万加仑化学品
- 棉花收割机上的RFID技术，用于产量地图和棉花质量
- 8系列和9系列拖拉机的自动犁耕解决方案，耕地5万英亩，适用于2020年或之后的8系列车型和2022年或之后的9系列车型的改装解决方案
- 2025年推出的行沟视觉改装解决方案，按每英亩或每单位计费办理
